name: Fun With the Plush Ones
description:
Play against Plush Freddy, Bonnie, Chica and Foxy in this Fun With PlushTrap Game.

Earn Plush Tokens from winning and use them to buy more levels and extra game modes.

Two additional game modes to play once purchased.

  • Aggressive Mode: The plushies are much, much quicker.
  • Silent Mode: The plushies make no sound at all.

Minigames also available as an extra means to earn Plush Tokens.

  • Chica's Cupcake Clicker: You have ten seconds to click the cupcake as many times as you can.
  • Foxy's Treasure Hunt: You have 10 seconds to find as many coins as you can. Can you find them all?
  • Whack a Bonnie: Click on as many Bonnies when they pop up as you can. You have 10 seconds.
